title: Fun ranked team. Only lvl 30 requirements
body:
I am looking for members to start a ranked team. I have been solo queuing and been put up with toxic people all the time. This team has no requirements but to only be friendly and non-toxic. Also have the opportunity to play ranked and learn more about League. There is no rush in this team yet you must take notice that you will have to try your best to learn even when you are a terrible player.

Comment below like this or add me on Oceania server.

Summoner Name: 
Skype or teamspeak:
Rank if you have one: 
How often could you League?
What lane do you usually play?
What champions do you main?

Thanks a lot of reading,
 Taehyunnie09

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Distortion
Skype or teamspeak: both
Rank if you have one: gold
How often could you League? Random times, pretty often
What lane do you usually play? Top, sup
What champions do you main? Thresh, morg, janna, irelia, shen, rumble

Summoner Name: K3AGHAN
Skype:keaghan2134
Rank:bronze v due to lots of demotions, pretty much giving up on solo queue till i find a partner
How often can i play: almost everyday, i work nightshifts mostly but im free alll weekend and days
Lane: ADCCCC
Champions:caitlyn,twitch,quinn,corki, pretty much all the adcs, i can play other lanes too and i own almost all the champions in the game
as ive been playing league for 2 and a half years now
{{champion:104}}

Summoner Name: xinfinitestarx
Skype or teamspeak: Skype
Rank if you have one: Silver IV
How often could you League? Almost everyday
What lane do you usually play? Bot lane (Supp and ADC), can Top
What champions do you main? Caitlyn, Lux, Ashe, Soraka, Lulu

Summoner Name: Cymru
Skype or teamspeak: Skype
Rank if you have one: Silver V
How often could you League? Almost everyday or whenever i can
What lane do you usually play? BOT LANE, main ADC but also pref support
What champions do you main? Lucian, Jinx, Varus, Thresh, Jana

Summoner Name: Mullyplant94
Skype or teamspeak: Im new to skype downloaded for gaming never had to use ( AndrewFoster ) is the name i see, but i can just add others instead

Rank if you have one: Bronze IV but i feel that does not relate to my skill at all and more my lacking ability to carry a team
How often could you League? HA, whenever i want to or if i have something worth doing on it ( team event , duoing with a friend etc )
What lane do you usually play? Top>ADC>JG are my best lanes, but i see myself as an all rounder and play anywhere ( i play a meaaannnnnnn leona )
What champions do you main? I main Nasus,Leona,Varus,Mundo,Shyvana ( recently )Corki, and TBH i can play anyone if i learn them for long enough.


Looking forward to hearing back and provide some fun/enjoyment into my game and the teams, thanks for reading, and please get too me ASAP, as i am currently looking for a team and i kind of want to be a one-man show
You know, bit of loyalty

LinhTalent
skype: deplepxep , not very good w english though.
rank: plat 4 , a very non-toxic player
everynight if team all up for the game
adc>sup>top=jungle>mid

tell on add
Gold 5
everyday
mid or adc but can play any lane reasonably well
